thread.title: Here are 25 books Wall Street will be reading this spring
thread.title_full: Here are 25 books Wall Street will be reading this spring

author: Akin Oyedele
title: Here are 25 books Wall Street will be reading this spring
text:
Simon & Schuster 
"...a compelling collaboration between two men who have the dimensions of great literary figures. They became heroes in the university and on the battlefield―both had important careers in the Israeli military―and their research was deeply linked to their extraordinary life experiences." "Dark Matter" by Blake Crouch Amazon 
"A brilliantly plotted tale that is at once sweeping and intimate, mind-bendingly strange and profoundly human—a relentlessly surprising science-fiction thriller about choices, paths not taken, and how far we’ll go to."
